description: Tecnoesis is the annual techno-managerial event of NIT Silchar, promising all tech geeks the ideal niche of fascinating events, workshops, competitions and interactions worth a lifetime. This mega event has left its mark as of the most prominent techfests across the country. The cauldron of enthusiasm and knowledge attracts various students, presenting the chance to let their minds run wild with ideas, fostering the inventors of the future.
